scripts.storybook:svelte: cd packages/svelte && bun run storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.build-storybook:svelte: cd packages/svelte && bun run storybook build
scripts.storybook:react: cd packages/react && bun run storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.build-storybook:react: cd packages/react && bun run storybook build
